## ReadableLiquity.getLiquidityMiningSTBLReward() method

Get the amount of STBL earned by an address through mining liquidity.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLiquidityMiningSTBLReward(address?: string): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose STBL reward should be retrieved. |
